Description: Blue glazed composition amuletic figure of Horus(?) wearing the double crown; pierced transversely at the top of the back-pillar for suspension.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.29
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Dr Joseph John Acworth
